description: This is course is designed to teach you fundamental skills in the art of ice-skating. Each section demonstrates 4-6 skills to practice and master in the USFSA basic levels. All skills have a step-by-step video demonstration and helpful tips and tricks from an experienced coach. Whether you are looking for a new way to exercise, learn a new hobby, save money on expensive coaching fees, or finally putting those old skates in the closet to good use - this course is for you! Be sure to have a near-by ice arena where you can dedicate a minimum of 30 minutes a week of practice time. You are guaranteed to build confidence, strength, flexibility, tone, and coordination. I look forward to working with you and helping you reach your goals!
title: Ice-Skating: Basic Skills
